Description:
An Extra Large Family Home on 650m2*
Absolutely perfect for larger/extended families, this one-of-a-kind home stands out from the crowd with its exceptional floorplan flexibility, impressive land size & unbeatable convenience in the very heart of Craigieburn.
Eminently versatile, the home's spotless interior comprises 3 downstairs bedrooms, dedicated study & 3 updated bathrooms, along with a spacious lounge, kitchen/dining area & rear living room. Add to this a further 2 upstairs bedrooms, additional bathroom, living/meals area & second kitchen, as well as its own private entrance.
Other stand-out features include heating & cooling, solid timber floors, large laundry & excellent storage options, plus an outdoor al-fresco style entertaining area, substantial backyard, double garage via side driveway & additional front off-street parking space.
Walking distance to local parks & Cimberwood Drive buses, it's also close to Malcolm Creek trails, choice of shopping centres, primary & secondary schools, as well as easy access to Craigieburn Station & the Hume Freeway.

Description:
Class, Convenience & Parkland Proximity
Tucked away in a quiet one-way street yet moments from the buzz of Craigieburn Central, this double story townhouse provides a modern oasis of quality and class with its well-proportioned rooms, impressive inclusions and profusion of natural light throughout. Impeccable from start to finish, the home's interior comprises three genuinely oversized bedrooms (master with BIR) along with a deluxe ensuite and equally-stylish main bathroom. The spacious and versatile kitchen/dining area is complemented by an with a sleek kitchen complete with ample cupboard space & stainless steel appliances. Other stand-out features include large formal lounge, evaporative cooling & ducted heating, double remote control garage, roomy laundry and additional powder room (third WC). Immediate access to a choice of bus routes, Splash Leisure Centre & Anzac Park's renowned
recreational facilities, it's also close to Malcolm Creek trails along with a choice of popular primary & secondary schools. Outstanding modern living!

Low Maintenance Living in the Heart of Craigieburn
More than meets the eye, this home is set to impress with its long list of features & instant access to all Craigieburn amenities. Whether you're a first home buyer, looking to downsize or add to your investment portfolio this beautifully presented home is a must see!
Beyond its modern facade, this home offers 3 great size bedrooms (master includes walk-in robe & ensuite with double vanity), central sparkling bathroom, well appointed gourmet kitchen with stone benchtop & an abundance of storage, adjoining meals & spacious family room leading out to a low maintenance outdoor area.
Further features include, remote garage with internal entry, heating, cooling, landscaped gardens & so much more!
Perfectly located close to Newbury Primary School, Pelican Childcare, sporting facilities, Highlands Shopping Centre, Golden Sun Moth Park & public transport. An opportunity not to be missed. Call now for a private inspection

Enchanting Home in Prized Location
With an abundance of natural light & character, this beautifully presented home offers a functional floor plan on a low maintenance allotment. Perfect for first homebuyers, investors or those looking to downsize is this amazing home perched up high offering 3 generous size bedrooms (master with his & hers walk-in robe & ensuite), separate front living/study, a well appointed fully equipped gourmet kitchen with adjoining spacious open plan meals & family area which leads out to a low maintenance backyard, including an outdoor area with retractable canvas awnings.
Further features include, ducted heating, evaporative & split system cooling, remote garage, drive-through access, landscaped garden, garden shed, 6 panel solar system & much more.
Positioned to please within walking distance to Mt Ridley College, KU Craigieburn Children's Centre, Highgate Recreation Reserve, local shops, public transport, as well as within minutes to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, Splash Aqua Park & Leisure Centre, Craigieburn Junction & many more amenities.

Description:
Brand New Home.
Located in the popular Trijena estate with close proximity to all future amenities. This Brand-New family home offers space, style & luxury for the for the family to enjoy.
Featuring 4 good sized bedrooms (master with full en-suite and WIR). Leading through to an open plan living including good size kitchen with Caesar stone bench tops that overlooks family living and meals opens out to the low maintenance courtyard. Central bathroom with bathtub, single remote garage with internal access!
Fixtures & fittings including: ducted heating, Evaporative cooling, alarm system, dishwasher, blinds throughout, s/steel appliances and much more.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
Simply Turn The Key & Move In!
This is a fantastic opportunity to purchase a quality built home in the highly desirable Botanical Estate. Immaculately presented, this home has been designed to offer an easy lifestyle with minimal maintenance.
Comprising of three generous sized bedrooms, master with walk in robes & full ensuite. Additional bedrooms both with built in robes, serviced by a central bathroom.
Open-plan living in the heart of the home, modern kitchen with stone benchtop & stainless steel appliances. Step outside to an ambient outdoor living area with a low maintenance backyard, perfect for all your entertaining requirements.
Additional features include the comforts of evaporative cooling & ducted heating, spacious laundry, double remote control garage with internal access, fully manicured front & rear yard and much much more.
Perfect for the first home buyer or acute investor-this one won't last long, inspection is a must!
Call us today!

Shikha Vaid 0414 689 144

Description:
Great Home, Great Location, Massive Block
PRIVATE INSPECTIONS BY APPOINTMENT ONLY!
Situated in a quiet location, this updated family home introduces a brilliant opportunity for those starting out or slowing down. The location creates a desire for those wanting to buy a property merely moments away from public transport, shops and schools.
Comprising of three bedrooms with built in robes and wall to wall carpets (main with walk in robe and ensuite), multiple living rooms which include a formal lounge, that features a fireplace heater, study nook or bar and formal dining space. A well-appointed kitchen with adjoining meals area, filled with an abundance of natural light. Enjoy the oversized main family room that allows an outdoor visual along with direct access to the backyard via the family room and meals area.
On a substantial parcel of land measuring 649m2 approx development is definitely a consideration (STCA). Only a short drive to Craigieburn Plaza, Craigieburn Secondary College, Our Lady's Primary School, and walking distance to public transport, plus so much more. Other features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, tiles through-out, laundry with rear access, double garage with drive through capability.
Inspection is a must!

Description:
Contact Craig Frost on 0413 018 033 for a PRIVATE INSPECTION.
This meticulously maintained and beautifully presented five-bedroom Burbank home (2016), enjoys three living areas and fully landscaped surrounds, making living easy on 448sqm approx. With a flexible floorplan and a generous amount of space, this property is likely to suit a wide range of buyers for a family home that will change with their needs over the years to come.
Welcome inside to a wide tiled hallway that leads from the front formal living room, past the main bedroom with WIR and ensuite, to the exceptionally generous open family living zone which includes two additional living areas, kitchen and dining offering sliding door access to the rear yard.
The butler style kitchen is conveniently located close to the laundry and includes caesar stone benchtops, a brand new 900mm stainless steel electric stove and oven, breakfast servery and walk-in butler pantry.
The rear yard is a balance of synthetic grass and timber decking leading to the serviceable side of the house with clothes line and garage passage door access.
Additional features include; security monitor camera system, security doors, ducted heating, two split systems to living rooms, freshly painted, new carpets, built-in robes to four bedrooms and located close to schools, shopping precincts and public transport.
A note to buyers
We base our price ranges on comparable sales within the area and current market conditions. We do not over quote property to vendors or underquote property to buyers. We recognise that the final sale price will ultimately be influenced by competition within the market and that the advertised selling range is not a ceiling to the price buyers may be willing to pay to secure the purchase of the property.
Frost Real Estate is pleased to be able to offer our buyers complete dedication to your discrete purchasing experience. Every interested buyer is invited to put their best offer forward for the property with the knowledge that offers will not be disclosed between buyers. At the heart of Frost Real Estate is a passion for helping people enjoy the experience of purchasing and selling property. We hope that this information helps you with your property search.
While every effort has been made to provide the correct description of the property and identify the properties features, we advise you to conduct an inspection of the property for your own satisfaction. Please contact Craig Frost on 0413 018 033 for further information and to arrange a private inspection.

Approx 2 kms to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre - Brand New Home
(PLEASE USE WWW.WHEREIS.COM OR APPLE IPHONE MAPS TO FIND THE ADDRESS)
Ticks all the buyer's wish list

2. 4 bedrooms, 2 Living Areas, 2 bathrooms & double garage
3. Approx 800 m walk to Aitken Hill Primary School
4. Approx 2 kms to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre
5. Approx 4 kms to Craigieburn Train Station
6. Bus stop to Craigieburn train station at approx 500m walk
7. Plus, if you're a first home buyer, you may be eligible for the $10,000 FHOG!!
Only 5% to secure the property and balance on settlement!!
Mike Sarupria presents 29 Archipelago Drive, Craigieburn in the prestigious Mt Aitken estate & only a short drive to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, Highlands Shopping Centre & schools. Photos are from previous similar property.
This brand new home comes equipped with luxury turn-key inclusions such as professionally styled interior colour themes, stone bench tops, carpets, tiles, higher ceilings and much more.
29 Archipelago Drive Features:
- 4 spacious bedrooms, master will full double vanity ensuite and walk in robe remaining 3 bedrooms with built in robes.
- Well-equipped kitchen & stainless steel cooking appliances including 900 mm gas cook top, range hood, dishwasher, walk in pantry and island bench.
- Open plan living space comprising spacious dining and living area adjacent kitchen.
- Formal Lounge
- Modern central bathroom.
- Spacious laundry
- Central ducted heating and provisions for evaporative cooling
- Concrete perimeter around the house and security alarm
- Remote control double car garage and much more!
Call Mike on 0430 126 491 or Frank on 0426 425 361 now for further information or to arrange an inspection.

Description:
Ticks All The Boxes
Sitting on 405sqm of land and located in the very popular Botanical Estate, amongst quality homes and beautiful parklands and within close proximity to all future amenities. This Beautiful home ticks all the boxes.
Featuring 4 bedrooms (master with full en-suite and WIR), open plan living including good size kitchen with Caesar stone that overlooks family and meals area with access to outdoor entertaining area, central bathroom, separate laundry, double garage, ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, high ceilings, s/steel appliances, dishwasher, alarm system, blinds and much more.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
Earn the Grant and pay Zero Stampduty!
Located in the vibrant new Annadale Estate amongst an impressive standard of new homes and local parklands, rests a low maintenance landscaped home perfect for first home buyers and investors. Boasting 3 bedrooms with mirrored robes including a master with the essential WIR and en-suite compliment. Developed with style and function, internal access from your garage flows into the modern open plan kitchen and living room. Square set cornices across the 2.7M high ceiling and above standard door frames, promote a light filled and spacious layout with a quality kitchen featuring Westinghouse stainless appliances and Caeserstone benchtops & waterfall edge to compliment the undermount sink. The home has also been upgraded with timber floors, downlights and exposed aggregate driveway and patio, reinforcing the quality of fixtures and fittings your new address have installed.
Location oozes convenience, direct access to the Hume Fwy, 15km from the Melbourne International Airport and only 30km to the Worlds Most Livable City
A great opportunity not to be missed, inspect today!
Corona Virus inspection policy will be in place to enact social distancing.

Description:
Move the family into your 'brand new' home, very soon.
Gorgeous faÃ§ade, position perfect, beautifully landscaped, discover this quality four bedroom Fairhaven soon to be exdisplay.
Master favoured with delightful ensuite and WIR. Discover central well appointed kitchen with stone benches, stainless steel appliances and dishwasher.
Spacious separate family and rumpus rooms, and out to a beautiful alfresco.
The further 3 bedrooms all have mirrored sliding doors, and are serviced easily by the stylish main bathroom.
Neutral tones, square sets cornices, feature light fittings and all the modern conveniences complete this picture.
Brand new and simply nothing to do.

Description:
First Home or Downsize !! This is Perfect !!
Located in the popular Merrifield Estate with close proximity to all future amenities. This Brand-New family home offers space, style & luxury for the for the family to enjoy.
Featuring 4 good sized bedrooms (master with full en-suite . Leading through to an open plan living including good size kitchen with Caesar stone bench tops & walk in pantry that overlooks family living and meals opens out to the low maintenance courtyard. Central bathroom with bathtub,
.
Other features include: High ceilings, High quality Toshiba Inverter Reverse Cycle Ducted heating and refrigerated cooling (zonal system), separate powder room, Rinnai continues gas hot water, alarm, window furnishings with fly screens, power saving downlights, intercom, a large separate laundry, remote car garage and 1 car space in front with internal private access into the home and even a vacuum maid.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.
Other features include: High ceilings, High quality Toshiba Inverter Reverse Cycle Ducted heating and refrigerated cooling (zonal system), separate powder room, Rinnai continues gas hot water, alarm, window furnishings with flyscreens, power saving downlights, intercom, a large separate laundry, remote car garage and 1 car space in front with internal private access into the home and even a vacuum maid. I look forward to showing you through at the
next open home.

Description:
The Perfect Starter!
Whether you're looking to enter the market and purchase your first home or wanting to invest; this beautifully maintained double storey dwelling is everything you're looking for within minutes from schools, public transport, local shops, lakes, walking/ cycling tracks. Offering 3 good size bedrooms (master with full ensuite and all with BIR's), separate study/ 4th bedroom, good size kitchen that overlooks spacious living and dining area with access to outdoor timber decking entertaining area, 3rd bathroom downstairs, separate laundry, double carport with remote control.
Fixtures and fittings including; high ceilings, balcony, ducting heating, reverse cycle cooling, double blinds, kitchen appliances, dishwasher and much more.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.
